lines: CS 5AH 176CH 568
283HENA NDIWE? HENA NIDME?
SHALL YOU? SHALL I
Doh is F
Umwi aka njile mu munzi, Lino lino lino lino;
Kumvwa bulemu bulindila, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
UmwÕuyakwenda mumigwagwa, Bubotu bwa nkuko abone,
Bubotu bwa nkuko bumvwidwe, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
Umwi aka tule Ciingano, Lino lino, lino lino;
Musyini uya kuba Ônguwe, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
Umwi uya kubona Mwami, Mapenzi a nyika amana,
Kukomana anguwe lyoonse, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
Umwi uya kukonkomona, Lino lino, lino lino;
Ijwi lyamba kuti nsekuzyi, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
UmwÕuyakwita takamumvwi, Wajana mulyango wajalwa
Umwi takapengwi bulumbu, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
Umwi uya kwimba kukoma, Lino lino, lino lino;
Kulumbaizya abasale, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
Umwi uya kwanzya kunkomwe, Bayandwa Ônyika bakaswane.
Mubulemu kukabe lyonse, Hena ndiwe? Hena ndime?
